channel.title: GDACS RSS information
channel.description: Near real-time alerts about natural disaster with a potential humanitarian impact

item.title: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 5.8M, Depth:9.1km) in United States 13/02/2025 23:59 UTC, No people affected in 100km.
item.description: On 2/13/2025 11:59:26 PM, an earthquake occurred in United States potentially affecting No people affected in 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 5.8M, Depth:9.1km.
item.dc:subject: EQ1
item.gdacs:severity: Magnitude 5.8M, Depth:9.1km

gdacs:resource.gdacs:title: Event in rss format
gdacs:resource.gdacs:description: Joint Research Center of the European Commission
gdacs:resource.gdacs:acknowledgements: Copyright European Union. Syndication allowed, provided the source is acknowledged.

item.title: Green alert for tropical cyclone ZELIA-25. Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 26162 .
item.description: From 11/02/2025 to 14/02/2025, a Hurricane/Typhoon > 74 mph (maximum wind speed of 241 km/h) ZELIA-25 was active in SEIndian. The cyclone affects these countries: Australia (vulnerability Low). Estimated population affected by category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 26162 .
item.dc:subject: TC1
item.gdacs:severity: Hurricane/Typhoon > 74 mph (maximum wind speed of 194 km/h)
item.gdacs:population: Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 26162

item.title: Green alert for tropical cyclone SIXTEEN-25. Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0 (15205 in Tropical Storm).
item.description: From 11/02/2025 to 12/02/2025, a Tropical Storm (maximum wind speed of 74 km/h) SIXTEEN-25 was active in SEPacific. The cyclone affects these countries: New Caledonia (vulnerability Medium). Estimated population affected by category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0 (15205 in tropical storm).
item.dc:subject: TC1
item.gdacs:severity: Tropical Storm (maximum wind speed of 74 km/h)
item.gdacs:population: Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0 (0.273 million in Tropical Storm)

item.title: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 5.9M, Depth:18km) in Vanuatu 10/02/2025 00:09 UTC, 110 thousand in 100km.

item.dc:subject: EQ1
